name: Newage Electronics
overview:
Established in 1976, we are serving the electronics industry from last several years in the field of measuring instruments like Multimeter, Clamp Meter.

Our Products: measuring instruments like Multimeter, Clamp Meter, Lux Meter, Sound Level Meter, Distance Meter, Laser Temperature Gun, Lcr Meter, Mfd Meter, Anemometer, Cfm Meter, Tachometer, AC/DC Clamp Meter etc.

Our Quality Assurance: Being a quality centric organization, we put special emphasis on high standards of quality and precision of the sourced array of products. These products are manufactured by our vendors using premium quality factor inputs and advanced techniques.

Client Satisfaction: Being a quality-centric organization, we lay immense emphasis on the quality of the offered products. Our offered products are manufactured using supreme class raw material and latest technology in compliance with international standards at vendors end.

Vendor Base: To achieve the complete satisfaction of our customers as well as to meet the international quality standards, we procure our products from the certified & reliable vendors of the market. We maintain healthy relationship with our vendors and they also cooperate with us.

Why Us ?: Some of the factors that have positioned us as one of the favored choices of the clients are: International quality standard range Well equipped manufacturing facility Expert team of engineers, industrial designers and other supporting staff Customized packaging Competitive prices
